Room.Name: Waterfront Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Waterfront Way, south of Iila's Salts and Preserves.
Room.LongDescription: Food storage is a very important part of today's society, as who knows when a famine can strike. However, most perishable goods don't last for more than a couple of days. When you by some meat, you usually have to buy the whole cow, and a whole cow can last a family for months. Therefore, the quick solution may be found at Iila's, who specializes in long-term food storage.
